name: Tests
description: Project automates the process of tests creation. This process allows users enter all parameters and description of yourself without administrator.
author: Matveev Savva

scripts.td: npm run build-jsx & browserify js/main.js -d -o build/js/bundle.js & rm -rf js/jsx/{1,2}/*.js & rm -rf js/jsx/*.js
scripts.watch: supervisor --watch js --extensions js --no-restart-on exit --exec 'npm run build'
